definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: He keeps back the streams from flowing, and makes the secret things come out into the light.
sentences.chinese: 他封閉水不得滴流，使隱藏的物顯露出來。

sentences.english: The hydrogenation of xylose aqueous solution has been studied in pressure elevated trickle bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 本文對滴流牀中壓加氫生產木糖醇的工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: And I think on friends most dear, with the bitter, bitter tear.
sentences.chinese: 想起了最親的朋友們，我苦淚滴滴流。

sentences.english: This small trickle developed into a big stream.
sentences.chinese: 這個小滴流成一個大發展。

sentences.english: He bindeth the floods from overflowing; and the thing that is hid bringeth he forth to light.
sentences.chinese: 他封閉水不得滴流，使隱藏的物顯露出來。

sentences.english: Much blood was shed in the war.
sentences.chinese: 血從他臉上一滴滴流下來。

definition: whirling/spinning around and around/round and plump (e.g. of fruit)
